entities.name: felix felicis
entities.description: Felix Felicis is mentioned as being consumed by Harry Potter. It is described as a potion that gives the drinker good luck.

entities.name: party
entities.description: The party is where Harry arrives and is greeted with cheers and clapping. The party is also mentioned as being hosted by Slug-horn.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is mentioned as being present at the party. He is described as a 'filthy hypocrite' by Ginny.

entities.name: ginny weasley
entities.description: Ginny Weasley is mentioned as being present at the party. She is described as smirking and calling Ron a 'filthy hypocrite'.

entities.name: romilda vane
entities.description: Romilda Vane is mentioned as trying to flirt with Harry and hinting that she would like to go to the party with him.

entities.name: slug-horn
entities.description: Slug-horn is mentioned as hosting a Christmas party. He is also mentioned in relation to Romilda Vane's flirting with Harry.

relationships.description: Harry Potter consumes Felix Felicis at the party.
Ginny Weasley calls Ron a 'filthy hypocrite'.
